result.execSummary:
The defendant Andrew L. PRICE was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Maintain full-time employment/schooling combination unless he qualifies for social security disability.

Pay supervision fees in an amount to be determined by the Department of Corrections.

Assessment, treatment, counseling as deemed appropriate by the Department's assessment process.

Engage in any treatment deemed appropriate by the agent.

Hearing is set for 06-20-16 at 3:30 p.m.

Attorney Pangburn is questioning the defendant's ability to proceed today.  He has been trying to explain the plea agreement to the defendant and he doesnt seem to be understanding.
The Court orders a competency evaluation.
Attorney Pangburn to prepare the order.
Minutes.
Plea date on May 12, 2016 at 03:00 pm.
From Attorney Pangburn to Judge Fox.

Defendant failed to appear for a plea date.  State requests warrant.  Court authorizes warrant.
Minutes.
Plea date on May 9, 2016 at 11:30 am.
Plea date at 03-29-2016 11:00 am
Eric Pangburn, through public defender.

Defendant's Demand for Discovery and Inspection.
Cover letter.

Not guilty plea.  Jury Calendar.   Settlement conference with the District Attorney is set for 01-06-16 at 10:15 a.m.  Plea date is set for 03-18-16 at 9:00 a.m.   Bail is set at $250.00 recognizance bond with the condition that defendant must report to the Manitowoc City Police Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours.   Bail furnished.
